name: zringcrng

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(ZZring ∈ CRing, CCfld ∈ CRing, ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

body.origin:
|- wcel(zring, ccrg)
-| wcel(ccnfld, ccrg)
-| wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))
-| wi(wa(wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wcel(zring, ccrg))
body.pretty:
⊢ ZZring ∈ CRing
⊣ CCfld ∈ CRing
⊣ ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)
⊣ ((CCfld ∈ CRing ∧ ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))→ ZZring ∈ CRing)
